thread.title: A Family’s $65,000 Bar for All Ages

author: Karen Bruno
title: A Family’s $65,000 Bar for All Ages
text:
The bar in this Manhattan duplex penthouse does double duty: It’s a milkshake station for the children and a place to pour the stronger stuff for their parents.
The homeowners—one works in a family real-estate development business and the other is an administrator at Columbia University—wanted to create a space in their living room where they could relax at the end of a long day without trips to the kitchen to replenish their drinks. The couple turned to Fox-Nahem Associates, a New York interior-design firm, to create a bar... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
